title: Shaonian Ge Xing: Xue Ran Tianqi Pian

alternative_titles.ja: 少年歌行 血染天启篇

synopsis:
After bidding farewell to the heavenly mountain, Mo Yi and Baili Dongjun, these two peerless masters, retire from the world. Xiao Se reclaims his true self and regains his dignity. Lei Wujie and others also receive gifts from immortals, significantly improving their power at different levels. All of them are determined to make their way to the Tianqi City. After parting ways in the martial world, they will reunite in the imperial court. The three major forces, King Xiao Se of Yong'an, King Xiao Chong of Bai, and King Xiao Yu of Chi, gather together, marking the start of the struggle for the throne. Who will ascend to power in the Tianqi City?

(Source: Youku)
